subject: Issues with the control box
description_text:
Hello, so I bought the simsonn pedals and the simmagic haptic motors, these
motors plug in into the control box where the pedals are also conected.
But somehow it does not work, I dont even know if the two are comunicate
with eachother.
The simmagis support team send me to you guys to see what your opinion is
on this.
My solution whould be to buy an extra control box from simmagic, but what
are your thoughts on this?

conversations.body_text: Hi Pit Biren,  Did you purchase a power supply? Please send us a photo of it so we can help you confirm.

so i bought the power suply from simmagic



On Thu, 16 Oct 2025 at 11:06, service@simsonn.com

Hi Pit Biren,    Our PlusX controller, Simagic power supply, and Simagic motor are fully compatible and should work without issues. Please download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2, then go to Settings → Update and update the firmware to version 2.0.5. After the update, test the vibration feedback and make sure to enable the corresponding telemetry.  You can also use the latest version of SimHub, which supports more games. Please note that SimHub and SIMSONN Manager should not be opened at the same time to avoid conflicts. If the issue persists, please record a short video and send us the Google Drive link (with proper access permissions) so we can review it and help you resolve the problem.
